content_descriptors.notes:
The Queendom of Lithzena features sexual themes that are purely fantasy and intended for entertainment purposes only. Our team does not condone or promote any real-life sexual behavior that is non-consensual, illegal, or harmful to someone's well-being. Please enjoy the game responsibly and with a mature understanding of its fictional nature.

If the content becomes too intense, please do not continue and take a break. Your well-being is important to us.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs on 1980 X 1080 Resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs on 1980 X 1080 Resolution
